description:
One life. One level. One bullet.

Goal
- With only one health, survive and kill required amount of enemies to win.

Controls
- Movement: Arrow Keys
- Shoot: Space (While fuel is full)
- Left Shift: Switch to Ball/Robot Form

Robot Form 

- Robot Form can fire your weapon.

Ball Form

- While in Ball Form, taking hits will recharge your weapon.

- Ball Form can double jump.
